items.title: Syria's defiant Kurds vow to 'fight until last breath' despite government push
items.description: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.

items.title: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
items.description: Russia has not confirmed it agreed to Trump's request, but Ukraine's president said he expected Vladimir Putin's promise to be kept.

items.title: Joshua pays emotional tribute in new video
items.description: Anthony Joshua posts an emotional YouTube video thanking fans for their support following the deaths of his two close friends in a car crash in Nigeri...

items.title: British girl, 7, swept out to sea on holiday in Morocco
items.description: Inaayah Makda remains missing after being caught out by a rapidly incoming tide, a relative has said.

items.title: 'He enjoyed hurting people': Teen attacked others before murdering schoolboy, 12
items.description: Det Insp Joe Davenport says the killer attacked his victims in Birmingham for "violence sake".
